introText: Our Children of Silba program introduces young adventurers to the magical underwater world through play and discovery. Following the internationally recognized Apnea Academy Kids as Dolphins curriculum, children learn safe diving fundamentals while having the time of their lives in the crystal-clear waters of Silba island.
featuresDescription1: Children learn freediving naturally through games and fun activities. No pressure, just pure enjoyment of the underwater world.
featuresDescription2: We teach the basics of safe breath-hold diving and underwater safety in an age-appropriate way that kids can understand and remember.
featuresDescription3: Our program follows the international Apnea Academy Kids as Dolphins (AA KAD) curriculum, designed specifically for young freedivers.
featuresDescription4: We maintain small group sizes to ensure each child receives individual attention and can progress at their own pace.
featuresDescription5: Our instructors are specially trained to work with children, combining freediving expertise with patience and understanding.
featuresDescription6: The pristine waters around Silba island provide the perfect safe environment for children to discover the underwater world.
